info.name: Koneko-Chan - Gmail Login
info.description:
hola chicos,
hoy les traigo un estilo para la pagina de inicio de sesión de gmail, esta vez de Koneko-Chan de High School DxD :3.
mas adelante creare de otro personaje, o si quieren de un personaje en especial solo déjenlo en los comentarios.
si les gusto deje un like y compartanlo con sus amigos ;)

Hi guys,
Today I bring you a style for the gmail login page, this time from Koneko-Chan High School DxD: 3.
Later I will create of another personage, or if they want of a personage in particular just leave it in the comments.
If they like to leave a like and share it with their friends. ;)
info.additionalInfo: yellow heart hyperdimension neptunia - Gmail Login: https://userstyles.org/styles/135265/yellow-heart-hyperdimension-neptunia-gmail-login
